DataElement.preferredName: Patient Period Post Last Dose Craniospinal Irradiation Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating the patient meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial with regards to time elapsed since the last dose of craniospinal irradiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Period Post Last Dose Craniospinal Irradiation Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:An interval of time._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._The use of radiation therapy directed at the brain and spinal cord to kill cancer cells._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Period Post Last Dose Craniospinal Irradiation Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: An interval of time.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:The use of radiation therapy directed at the brain and spinal cord to kill cancer cells.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The use of radiation therapy directed at the brain and spinal cord to kill cancer cells.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Workflow and Registration Status Changed per Brenda Duggan; 05.16.18; ADVL1521 - WWL

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has time elapsed since the last dose of craniospinal irradiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been greater than or equal to 6 months since craniospinal XRT was received?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been at least 6 months since the last dose of craniospinal XRT?
